content: pass the honey cowl is a fun functional neck warmer that will keep you snug and cozy all winter the cowl was inspired by the hexagonal wax cells built by honeybees to store their larvae honey and pollen knit seamlessly in the round the mock honeycomb pattern creates strands of yarn running across the fabric s surface resulting in a beautiful waffle-y texture that is easy to create but looks delightfully intricate and tricky
